title.narrative: WFP efforts in relation to the crisis in Yemen, 2015-2018

description.narrative: WFP's operation in Yemen over the next six months (until March 2016) is only 30% financed. WFP is thus 226 million USD short. The assistance focuses on the delivery of food and Cash-based assistance for 6 million food insecure people. Since the beginning of the conflict WFP has fed almost 4,5 million people; during the month of August some 1.108.000 people received food assistance. WFP still has access to a part of the affected communities and ships that dock in the harbours of Yemen. Still, challenges lie in the delivery of aid for the southern regions but the organisation is working to establish alternative routes of transport to also de able to deliver there.
